*   Regions of Opportunity : Canada

**Notice for Standing Offer**
The Department of National Defence (DND) invites qualified service providers with the capacity, resources, instructors, and personnel to support mountain training, accommodations, and advisory services on an "if and when" requested basis. The services will be provided on a three-year firm term with two one-year option periods.

**Notice Details**
*   Point of Delivery: Offeror's facility
*   Delivery Level: Physical
*   Canadian Goods and/or Services Preference: yes
*   Documents: The offer should be submitted in either of the official languages of Canada, electronically in PDF format and attached to the request for standing offer.
*   Possible Delivery Point: Canada

**Service Description**
This Standing Offer (SO) is for services required by DND for mountain training, accommodations, and advisory services. Services will be provided on an "if and when" requested basis over a period of three years with two additional one-year option periods.

**Important**
*   Requests for Standing Offer Respondents must provide required information as detailed in article 2.3 of Part 2 of the bid solicitation, in order to comply with Treasury Board policies and directives on contracts awarded to former public servants.
*   The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
